title: Tarte tatin
description: Instead of the traditional puff this recipe uses soured cream pastry - still wonderfully flaky but far easier to make.
ingredients: 2 tbsp soured cream, or crème fraîche
4 eating apples, Granny Smith or Golden Delicious; if using a small variety, such as Cox’s Orange Pippin, you will need about 6 apples
whipped cream, ice-cream or whipped cream with a little icing sugar
